Name: Site measure completed
Tag 1: Site measure completed - Opening size correct

Name: Waterproofing in place
Tag 1: Waterproofing in place where applicable (i.e rebate)

Name: All windows installed in correct location
Tag 1: All windows installed in correct location according to drawing provide

Name: Sub-head & sub-sill install correctly
Tag 1: Sub-head and sub-sill install correctly and fully seal on sub-sill (Photo Require)

Name: Window - opening/closing/latching correctly
Tag 1: Window - opening/closing freely & latching correctly (Photo Require)

Name: Jocky sash/flyscreen - opening/closing/latching correctly
Tag 1: Jocky sash or flyscreen - opening/closing freely & latching correctly (Photo Require)

Name: All Windows & small infill Installed
Tag 1: All Windows and small infill Installed and hardware correctly & area left clean/tidy (Photo Require)

Name: Remove all protection films & tapes
Tag 1: Remove all the protection films & tapes and clean the glass from non-accessible area prior to install

Name: Frame covered by protection tap & free of damage
Tag 1: Frame are covered by protection tap and free of damage

Name: Glass/Awning Sash securely fixed in position
Tag 1: Glass/Awning Sash is securely fixed in position and free of damage

Name: Door threshold & infills installed & free of damage
Tag 1: Door threshold and infills are installed and free of damage

Name: Sliding/Hinged door/Awning windows secured
Tag 1: Sliding/Hinged door/Awning windows and hardware is securely fixed in position and functional
